IntroText: It's you!  This pink thing is still inside and|it buzzes crazy.  How do you remove it?
Hey there!  Two classes together in row.|Would you like to practice judo with me?
(She sighs.)  Oh my.  It's you again.|I guess we have to practice judo together.
So nice!  What a coincidence.|It will be fun to try judo together.
Have you tried judo before?
They say that practice makes perfect.|Should we practice or do a real match?
You're a good fighter!  Now your self-defense|move is to restrain me.  I won't make it easy.
Your next self-defense move is to remove|my judo outfit and restrain me with ropes.
Oh my!  You certainly turned the tables.|Try to restrain me then, it won't be easy.
Since I won the fight, my next self|defense move is to restrain you.
To complete my self-defense, I need to|remove your outfit and tie you with ropes.
Turnabout is fair play they say.|Now it's my turn to try to restrain you.
You're pretty good but next time I'll fight better.|Did you enjoy this judo and self-defense practice?
That was great!  You fight really well.|I'll need lots of practice to reach your level.
That was amazing!  You're the perfect fighter.|Take the gag in my bag for your final move.
You restrained me pretty well.|I guess you already knew self-defense.
(She whimpers and looks at you.|She seems to want to be released.)
(She whimpers and looks at you.|She seems to want to be released.)
(She blushes red and tries to look away.)
(She blushes red and tries to look away.)
(She blushes red and tries to look away.)
A nice little package!|Isn't judo and self-defense great?
I hope you learned a few tricks in our match.|Now your challenge is to escape from these ropes.
I hope you learned a few tricks in our match.|Now your challenge is to escape from these ropes.
I hope you learned a few tricks in our match.|Now your challenge is to escape from these ropes.
Are you ok?  You were trembling pretty badly.
Nod if you're ok.  You|were trembling pretty badly.
Nod if you're ok.  You|were trembling pretty badly.
Another judo practice before we go to lunch?
